content: shuppet pattern by mochielle shuppet pattern by mochielle left to right official plushie large shuppet 9mm hook small shuppet 4mm hook shuppet the puppet pokemon it eats up emotions like malice jealousy and resentment so some people are grateful for its presence materials  blue-gray yarn  crochet hook 1 size below what s recommended for the yarn  polyester filling  tapestry needle  felt light blue dark blue yellow brown for the eyes  hot glue for the felt  scissors for yarn & felt shuppet pattern by mochielle abbreviations  magic_ring = magic_ring  single_crochet = single_crochet  double_crochet = double_crochet  increase = increase 2 single_crochet in 1 stitch  decrease = decrease stitch 1 single_crochet into 2 stitches  incdc = increase using double_crochet  slip_stitch = slip_stitch ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- head & main body ☐ r1 magic_ring single_crochet 6
